system.weapons:
Hull, one of: Front Facing Heavy Bolter, Heavy Flamer

Pintle (Optional), one of: Heavy Stubber or Storm Bolter
system.specialRules:
Traits: Enclosed, Rugged, Tracked Vehicle

Special Rules: Possesses a Winch that can tow one Vehicle up to Massive Size. With two, tow Immense. With four, tow Monumental or Larger. Regardless reduces Manoeuvrability to -20. Winching takes 2 minutes, must remain stationary.

Can be used for Field Repairs to lift vehicle, reduces difficulty of test by +10 (EG -20 to -10). Hits to the Vehicle's Rear strike the winch, treated as a weapon for Critical Damage Purposes, can be disabled.
